prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Piano, Bass, Drums, Reed, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the sounds of Guitar, Piano, Bass, Drums, and Reed, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Piano, Bass, Drums, and Reed, but no Brass is included.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Guitar, Piano, Bass, Drums, and Reed, omitting Brass.
